page.title: 10Wormleighton Pedigree Herd
page.content: A Pedigree Herd of Wresto Cattle are kept at Hall Farm. This herd started with twelve heifers from Silso in Bedfordshire. Good Friesians were bought locally and from these has been raised the Wresto Herd which now comprises 140 milking cows, 100 followers (young stock) and 20 beef cattle. With the current milk quota due to overproduction in the Common Market it is necessary to cull hard so only the best cattle are kept within the herd. All the cattle are kept inside for the winter and by the beginning of December all are under cover.
